scripts.db:restart: node database/config/drop.js && node database/config/migrate.js && node database/config/seed.js
scripts.db:restart:prod: heroku run node database/config/drop.js -a %npm_package_name% && heroku run node database/config/migrate.js -a %npm_package_name% && heroku run node database/config/seed.js -a %npm_package_name%
